alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Windham, northeastern Washington, Kent and southwestern Providence Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Foster, or 8 miles north of Coventry, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Warwick, Cranston, Coventry, West Warwick, Johnston, North Kingstown, Killingly, East Greenwich, Scituate, Glocester, Richmond, Exeter, West Greenwich, Foster and Sterling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
